mapper.insert: insert into contract (contract_id, material_id, contract_file_pic_url, contract_status) values (#{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractFilePicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
